body_html:
Seconded this. I find myself having more and more dependencies on torch.distributions.utils._finfo (here) which is obviously very useful but maybe not stable? I also find myself needing max, min and others.

Would be great with a full finfo but where should it live?
body_text:
Seconded this. I find myself having more and more dependencies on torch.distributions.utils._finfo (here) which is obviously very useful but maybe not stable? I also find myself needing max, min and others.
Would be great with a full finfo but where should it live?
body:
Seconded this. I find myself having more and more dependencies on `torch.distributions.utils._finfo` ([here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/distributions/utils.py)) which is obviously very useful but maybe not stable? I also find myself needing max, min and others. 

Would be great with a full [finfo](https://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy-1.14.0/reference/generated/numpy.finfo.html) but where should it live?
